Package com.github.wuic.util

Utility package where helper methods are defined.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CloseableZipFileAdapter Adapts a ZipFile to be a Cloneable.
CollectionUtils Utility class built on top of the java collection framework helping WUIC to deal with collections.
IOUtils Utility class built on top of the java.io package helping WUIC to deal with I/O.
NumberUtils Utility class providing helper constants and static methods around numbers.
StringUtils Utility class providing helper constants and static methods around strings.
 

Package com.github.wuic.util Description

Utility package where helper methods are defined. We prefer to define our own utility class as much as possible instead of increasing the number of dependencies.

Author:
Guillaume DROUET
